title: Only getting 'reason=timeout' for 'Stopping work on payload' notifications
body:
Running GETH 1.11.6 and Prysm 4.0.3 via the Rocketpool SmartNode. No validator running (yet)

Everything else in the logs look healthy. Good amount of synced peers both for the EC and CC. 

Is it intended behaviour ? I'm litterally never getting _'reason=delivery'_ for those _'Stopping work on payload'_ notifications.

Logs excerpt :

> rocketpool_eth1  | INFO [04-21|13:03:01.527] Starting work on payload id=0x6f60f1f085f38704
> rocketpool_eth1  | INFO [04-21|13:03:01.594] Updated payload id=0x6f60f1f085f38704 number=17,094,938 hash=c06e4b..246230 txs=40  gas=2,695,737  fees=0.01341559371   root=1df4af..b78d67 elapsed=65.181ms
> rocketpool_eth1  | INFO [04-21|13:03:03.638] Updated payload id=0x6f60f1f085f38704 number=17,094,938 hash=9291e2..73b650 txs=55  gas=4,105,173  fees=0.01701709468   root=8b6f7a..728227 elapsed=43.630ms
> rocketpool_eth1  | INFO [04-21|13:03:05.685] Updated payload id=0x6f60f1f085f38704 number=17,094,938 hash=d06a7c..40eca2 txs=70  gas=5,319,861  fees=0.01930305102   root=98994c..596a64 elapsed=45.243ms
> rocketpool_eth1  | INFO [04-21|13:03:07.733] Updated payload id=0x6f60f1f085f38704 number=17,094,938 hash=31badc..44e18d txs=94  gas=7,288,594  fees=0.0229569909    root=59d301..c31022 elapsed=48.311ms
> rocketpool_eth1  | INFO [04-21|13:03:09.766] Updated payload id=0x6f60f1f085f38704 number=17,094,938 hash=637542..4237eb txs=112 gas=9,020,375  fees=0.02480740483   root=4f2aff..dc87eb elapsed=32.563ms
> rocketpool_eth1  | INFO [04-21|13:03:11.809] Updated payload id=0x6f60f1f085f38704 number=17,094,938 hash=0131d9..7ddda0 txs=142 gas=11,244,577 fees=0.02693994256   root=f92593..8f90f6 elapsed=41.651ms
> rocketpool_eth1  | INFO [04-21|13:03:12.936] Imported new potential chain segment     number=17,094,938 hash=4a96b4..d1db45 blocks=1 txs=143 mgas=11.467 elapsed=51.034ms   mgasps=224.688 dirty=255.49MiB
> rocketpool_eth1  | INFO [04-21|13:03:12.976] Chain head was updated                   number=17,094,938 hash=4a96b4..d1db45 root=f834bc..84b716 elapsed=1.860083ms
> rocketpool_eth1  | INFO [04-21|13:03:13.043] Starting work on payload                 id=0x3390763b8e54c7ed
> rocketpool_eth1  | INFO [04-21|13:03:13.063] Updated payload                          id=0x3390763b8e54c7ed number=17,094,939 hash=816520..1bc7dd txs=52  gas=5,317,018  fees=0.01265509503   root=25e4d5..6c246e elapsed=19.958ms
> rocketpool_eth1  | INFO [04-21|13:03:13.529] Stopping work on payload                 id=0x6f60f1f085f38704 reason=timeout
> 

Thanks alot.
